name: 4-schuriGoodEnding
commands: {var:MC_name}! We did it!|We beat Lilith!|The control on Senya should be dispelled too.
It feels like I got run over by a carriage.
Since you're cracking jokes, I'm glad you're doing alright.
The Argon Chalice.|It was a good thing we got here when we did, Lilith was in the middle of a spell.
Sorry I wasn't much help back there.|I tried to fight against her control, but I wasn't strong enough.
It wasn't your fault. If anything it was mine.|Remember how Lilith said about testing our bonds? I should have considered your feelings more.
Don't worry, we won't hold this against you.|Like {var:MC_name} said, it wasn't your fault.
The castle's all banged up, we have lots of work ahead of us.
After a hectic week fixing up the castle...
You know...this place doesn't suit me.
As I travelled caravan to caravan...|The new sights has always amazed lil' me. Admiring the scenery along the way...
I've done a lot of thinking and well...|I'm going to leave this Castle and go see the world.|There's still a lot of places I haven't been and...
I want to be stronger. I can't always be picked up after.
But it wasn't your fault. No one could have predicted that.

Even so, I've already made up my mind.|I want to grow stronger for myself|and to be able to care for those around me.|I also want to thank those who have taken care of me growing up. It's been a long while after all.
You've made up your mind huh?
Yes, nothing you say will change my mind.
...We'll respect your decision. When are you leaving?
I see...we'll come see you off.
True to her word, Senya left the very next day.
What do you plan to do?|It feels like we're all separating.
Hey..what do you mean! I'm still here you dolt.
But on a serious note, I want to pass down Sir Cyrus' teachings to honour his legacy.|He passed protecting us and I want to give back.
That sounds like an amazing idea. He would be proud.
I'll take care and continue building up the legacy he left behind.
And I'll help you with it.
Schuri and I ended up settling in the castle where the three of us grew up in.|Eventually, we took in our own little apprentice.|Ahh...it really brings back the memories....
source:
#schuri good ending, senya lives
#speak;;this is ending 4;;;narration
music;aliveGoodTheme
multi_add_portrait;MC;MidLeft;Schuri;FarLeft
music;aliveGoodTheme
bop_portrait;Schuri
speak;Schuri;{var:MC_name}! We did it!|We beat Lilith!|The control on Senya should be dispelled too.
speak;MC;Senya!
wait;500
add_portrait;PossessedSenya;Right
expression;PossessedSenya;CloseEyes
wait;250
remove_portrait;PossessedSenya
add_portrait;Senya;Right
expression;Senya;CloseEyes
speak;Senya;Ugh...my head...
speak;MC;Senya! How are you feeling?
speak;Senya;It feels like I got run over by a carriage.
speak;Schuri;Since you're cracking jokes, I'm glad you're doing alright.
bop_portrait;Schuri
speak;Schuri;Ah I almost forgot.
multi_remove_portrait;Senya;MC;Schuri
move_unit;Schuri;8,3
wait;500
give_item;Schuri;Argon Chalice (ArgonChalice)
wait;500
multi_add_portrait;MC;MidLeft;Schuri;FarLeft;Senya;Right
speak;Schuri;The Argon Chalice.|It was a good thing we got here when we did, Lilith was in the middle of a spell.
speak;Senya;Hm..yea that's great.
speak;Schuri;Hm? Senya, what's wrong?
speak;Senya;Sorry I wasn't much help back there.|I tried to fight against her control, but I wasn't strong enough.
speak;MC;It wasn't your fault. If anything it was mine.|Remember how Lilith said about testing our bonds? I should have considered your feelings more.
expression;Senya;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Senya;{var:MC_name}...
speak;Schuri;Don't worry, we won't hold this against you.|Like {var:MC_name} said, it wasn't your fault.
mirror_portrait;Schuri
mirror_portrait;Schuri
speak;Schuri;The castle's all banged up, we have lots of work ahead of us.
transition;close;2000
music;okHappyEnding
multi_remove_portrait;MC;Senya;Schuri
change_background;InsideCastle
transition;open
speak;;After a hectic week fixing up the castle...;;;narration_top
multi_add_portrait;Schuri;MidLeft;MC;FarLeft;Senya;Right
speak;Senya;You know...this place doesn't suit me.
speak;Schuri;...what do you mean, Senya?
expression;Senya;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Senya;As I travelled caravan to caravan...|The new sights has always amazed lil' me. Admiring the scenery along the way...
bop_portrait;MC
speak;MC;You're leaving?
expression;Senya;OpenEyes
speak;Senya;I've done a lot of thinking and well...|I'm going to leave this Castle and go see the world.|There's still a lot of places I haven't been and...
expression;Senya;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Senya;I want to be stronger. I can't always be picked up after.
speak;MC;But it wasn't your fault. No one could have predicted that.
speak;Senya;Even so, I've already made up my mind.|I want to grow stronger for myself|and to be able to care for those around me.|I also want to thank those who have taken care of me growing up. It's been a long while after all.
speak;Schuri;You've made up your mind huh?
speak;Senya;Yes, nothing you say will change my mind.
speak;MC;...We'll respect your decision. When are you leaving?
speak;Senya;I'll be leaving tomorrow morning.
speak;Schuri;I see...we'll come see you off.
transition;close;1000
change_background;VillageGate
multi_remove_portrait;Senya;Schuri;MC
transition;open
multi_add_portrait;Schuri;Right;MC;Left
speak;;True to her word, Senya left the very next day.;;;narration_top
speak;MC;What about you?
speak;Schuri;Huh?
speak;MC;What do you plan to do?|It feels like we're all separating.
move_portrait;Schuri;MidRight
speak;Schuri;Hey..what do you mean! I'm still here you dolt.
speak;MC;Haha..I guess so.
speak;Schuri;But on a serious note, I want to pass down Sir Cyrus' teachings to honour his legacy.|He passed protecting us and I want to give back.
speak;MC;That sounds like an amazing idea. He would be proud.
speak;Schuri;I'll take care and continue building up the legacy he left behind.
speak;MC;And I'll help you with it.
bop_portrait;Schuri
expression;Schuri;Smile
speak;Schuri;You will?
speak;MC;Of course I would!
speak;;Schuri and I ended up settling in the castle where the three of us grew up in.|Eventually, we took in our own little apprentice.|Ahh...it really brings back the memories....;;;narration_top
music_fade_back;2000
music;okEndingTheme
transition;close;2500
remove_portrait;MC
#ending cg?
change_background;default_background
transition;open;1000
speak;;Ending Achieved:|To The Unblemished Rose;center;;cinematic
set_next_chapter;2222
